column4: hi - amarok doesnt work, it claims that there is another program preventing it to work!!!
this may sound terrible, but go to the control panel turn off 'software mixing'
then run 'killall esd' in a terminal
'esd', which should be going away soon, is famous for blocking the soundcard when it doesn't have a hardware mixer
and Linux/ALSA does a better job of mixing in any case
what do you have running right now?
yeah, there is a tweak for that
fiesty is supposed to fix alot of the sound retardation
but as of now, pulse isn't integrated
in any case, close firefox, restart amarok
I doubt it. Amarok works pretty beautifully :P
